0x500FFE9D.name: GET_VEHICLE_DASHBOARD_LIGHTS
0x500FFE9D.description:
Gets the state of the player vehicle's dashboard lights as a bit set
indicator_left = 1
indicator_right = 2
handbrakeLight = 4
engineLight = 8
ABSLight = 16
gasLight = 32
oilLight = 64
headlights = 128
highBeam = 256
batteryLight = 512
